item.title: PhD Overview
item.description: An introduction to my research Live fast, die young? Fusce maximus dignissim lacus id rutrum. Curabitur malesuada tempor aliquam. Aenean a cursus dui. item.title: Simon Rolph - CV
item.description: Personal Statement Education 2016 - Present, University of Sheffield PhD student at the University of Sheffield, Department of Animal and Plant science. Primary supervisor: Dr Dylan Childs, with supporting supervisors; Dr Rob Salguero-GÃ³mez, Dr Jonathan Potts and Proffessor Rob Freckleton. President of the Animal and Plant Sciences Department PostGrad Soceity (June 2017-current) 2013-2016, University of Exeter BSc (Hons) in Conservation Biology and Ecology at University of Exeter (Penryn Campus) - 1st Class.
